[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1 Level and +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Magic:: Characters.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Magic:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When your other ::Magic:: Character attacks, this gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Climax is placed in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] When your other ::Magic:: Character attacks, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Magic:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When your other ::Magic:: Character attacks, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(3)] During your turn, when this card's Battle Opponent is Reversed, you may pay the cost. If so, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
Choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Cost 0 or lower Characters, put it in their Waiting Room, choose up to 1 ::Magic:: Character from your Waiting Room, and return it to your hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [(2)] When you Level-Up, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] All your other "Iroha, Alone Time" gain +1 Soul.
[A] BOND/"Iroha, Alone Time" [(1)]
[C] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Magic:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::TRAIT:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When this attacks, if "Wishes Granted" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, all of your other Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, search your Library for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."
--None--

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Magic:: Characters.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, put this on the bottom of the Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 4 or more other ::Magic:: Characters, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] During your turn, if you have another ::Magic:: Character, this gains +3000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Reason Why I Became a Magical Girl" is in your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 ::Magic:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, and you may pay cost. If so, look at the top card of your Library, search for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via the effect of [A] ability of your "Iroha's Doppel" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "To Cure Little Sister's Illness" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, you declare either 2, 3, or 4, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and this gains +4000 Power for the turn. X is equal to the number you declared this way. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, if there are 2 or fewer cards in your Memory, you may Send this to Memory.

[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all players perform the following action. "If there are 5 or more cards in your Memory, choose 4 cards in your Memory, and put all cards in your Memory other than those chosen this way in the Waiting Room."
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or lower, put it in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] [Rest this] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Memory, choose a ::Magic:: Character in your Waiting Room and Send it to Memory.

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Magic:: Characters.

[C] You may play this from your hand without meeting the color requirement.

[A] [(2) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Opponent's Library in their Clock.

[A] At the beginning of your Main Phase, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [Put a card from your hand in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at to up to X cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them and put it in your hand, and put the restin the Waiting Room. X = the number of your other ::Magic:: Characters.
[A] When your card is Sent to Memory, choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, all your other ::Magic:: Characters gain +500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Magic:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]"

[C] All your other ::TRAIT:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When Damage taken by you isn't Canceled, if there are 2 or fewer Markers under this, choose a Level 2 or higher Character in your Waiting Room and put it face-down under this as Marker.
[A] At the start of your Main Phase, if you are Level 2 or higher and there are 3 or more Markers under this, put all Markers from under this in the Waiting Room, and choose an "Iroha's Doppel" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this is in.

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, if this is in the Front Row, choose one of your Characters and either give it +1 Level or -1 Level for the turn.
[A] At the start of your Attack Phase, choose a Character in your Front Row, and if all Characters in your Front Row has the same Level as that Character, this gains +1000 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.
[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.

[A] At the start of your Draw Phase, put this in the Waiting Room, and choose up to 1 "Iroha, Ally of Mikazuki Household" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.

[C] During your turn, all your other "Felicia, Mercenary's Reward" gain +2000 Power and ::Cuisine::.
